title: Restaurant Sign Logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112010im_/http:/typophile.com/files/othellosign_4587.jpg)

Hello, I'm trying to recreate this sign, but I have no idea what font is used. I've tried several font finder tools and haven't found a match yet.

Could anybody shed some light on this?

Font: 

 Pretoria and Davida 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112010/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")
author: kazango

comments.content: OMG Thankyou so much I didn't even realize there were 2 fonts
